  2. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas Systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets were assigned up to 12:30 PM.

  3. OFC reading taken for Sonarpur-Bantala 24F (route lengths and route losses)

  4. OFC reading taken for Sonarpur-Natunpally 12F (route lengths and route losses)

1. Route survey has been done from Gobindapur Exchange to Khasmallick SBI_ JC for KML creation of DPR OFC.

  2. OFC planned route created between Gobindapur Exchange to Khasmallick SBI_ JC on Transnet.

  3. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas Systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets were assigned up to 6:00 PM.

1. Taken OFC route distance and cumulative loss for Sonarpur-Abantipur 48F rehab route.

  2. Taken OFC route distance and cumulative loss for Sonarpur-Harinavi 48F rehab route.

  3. Taken OFC route distance and cumulative loss for Sonarpur-Harinavi straight 24F route.

  4. Taken OFC route distance and cumulative loss for Sonarpur-Harinavi 12F route.

  5. Put through 10G DL of Abantipur-Sonarpur CPAN.

  6. Taken OFC route distance and cumulative loss for Sonarpur-AP Nagar 24F route.

Today visited Mahinagar_Gobindapur RSU_Gobindapur BTS for 4G MAAN RING execution job.

The ring is made with Harinavi-Baruipur 24F OFC having termination at Gobindapur From F-13 to F-24

1. Uploaded photos and videos at 9 places(4 photos and 1 video at each place) for 1950m route of JC near Subhasgram Bank plot to JC at Rail crossing near Natunpally on Transnet.

  2. Created 3 planned routes on transnet: a) M TXC KD HARINAVI SNP GHASIARA BTS-BJC KD HNV AERIAL JC NEAR GHASIARA BIDYAPITH-01 , 258498 , 1650m b) M TXC KD HARINAVI BRP RLY XING BTS-BJC KD HNV PADMAPUKUR-01, 258499, 900m and c) M TXC KD HARINAVI MISSION PCM-BJC KD HNV KRISHNA APARTMENT-01 , 258500, 1400m.

  3. Created kml file for Sonarpur Ghasiara BTS to JC near Sonarpur Bidyapith.

  4. Created kml file for Baruipur Rail crossing to JC near Padmapukur.

  5. Assisted TI unit for survey work for Sonarpur, Milan Pally IB leased ckt.

Attenteded SBI Baruipur Bazar fault, LC Id- 1000122714.Local mac was not being received. Checked the optical fibers and found them OK. There was an optical power loss in the media. The power loss was due to a fault in the HUAWEI port â€” the Tx power at the port itself was -17 dBm. Changing the SFP did not resolve the issue.

Configuration was done in Tejas and the details were posted in the CPAN group for shifting to another CPAN port. After the CPAN configuration was completed by the CPAN team, MAC was received from both ends, and the media appeared to be OK. However, ping was still not successful from their router.
The media converter and power adaptor at SBI Baruipur Bazar Branch were also replaced with a new one.
The vendor was approached to check the issue at their local end.

SBI Baruipur Bazar fault, LC Id- 1000122714, attended by BSNL team and SBI vendor(8017384766) also. Got mac from both side. Ping from directly connected laptop was successful but through router, ping not successful. Suspected Tejas equipment card issue, so directly connected through CPAN and router ping also successful after that. Circuit restored.

Hnv-Gdp 12F only 03 fibre was usable for system operation.Found fibre gtg damaged at 1.003 km most in underground portion.

506 m u/g portion of the cable replaced by overhead lay out between two J/C.

07 fibres retrieved out of 09. Now total 10 cables ready for use upto GDP RSU.

1. Attended meeting held today under chairmanship of PGM TX to monitor the progress of QOS of TX Equipment and OF Network.

  1. Uploaded photos and videos at 8 places(4 photos and 1 video at each place) for 1400m route of JC near Narendrapur mission Exchange to JC at krishna Appartment BTS site on Transnet.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No tickets have been assigned till now on Prabal Plus. There is DL failure in CPAN EMS (a) CTD_HNV_HARINAVI_10.123.138.193_GNE/3.6-CTD_HNV_RAJPUR SARKARPARA_10.123.138.215/2.5 (b) CTD_HNV_RAJPUR SARKARPARA_10.123.138.215/1.5-CTD_HNV_BARENDRA PARA BTS_10.123.138.249/2.5. Also there was dockets in trnsnet(Docket ID: 2822642 and 2822641

  2. Fault was due to Commercial Power Supply Failure. No Battery at the Site due to multiple Theft cases. Docket cleared on Transnet after site restoration.

  3. written an email to SDE CMTS Jadavpur for frequent system failures of CPAN A1 have been observed at Rajpur Sarkarpara BTS, primarily due to repeated power outages and the non-availability of a battery power plant.

  4. Measured optical fiber length at Harinavi End of two optical fiber HNV-BRL 48 F and HNV-BRL 24 F . Also updated the data on online transmission app.

LC ID-  1000123043 , SBI Subhasgram fault docket assigned. Found OFC cut at a distance of 3 km from Kamalgazi.There are 5 cable cuts at that location, 2 48F and 3 24F OFCs.SBI ckt restored diverting it. LMG shifted from MNGPAN(5.7) to GPON OLT Port-1. For diversion of BTS:- Sonarpur(VLAN-1748/1948), Sonarpur Teghoria(1006/1506), Narendrapur Krishna(1741/1941), Narendrapur II(1740/1940), Hindustan More(1489/1889), Sonarpur Kurigachi(1737/1937), Mandalpara(1071/1571), Boral II(1768/1968), Baruipur Kalyanpur(1792/1992), Barendrapara(1102/1602) written on CPAN group. Harinavi team alongwith SLA vendor attended the ofc cut site to restore that.

Boral RLU was completely out of order due to a power plant failure since yesterday (01-01-2025, 12:39). It was restored today at around 4:00 PM after replacing the existing unit with a spare power plant taken from another RLU.

1. 4 OFC dockets found on transnet. On measurment from Harinavi, found OFC fault at a distance of 0.944 Km. Merged 4 system faults into 2 cable faults. SLA team along with one Tx member was on site.Tracking for one cable was successful but other one(24F) was not, informed to Suin sir. After some time it was successful. Initially, the agency denied any damage caused by them; however, after persistent persuasion, they cooperated in locating the fault. Since the road is narrow and highly congested, there were significant difficulties in carrying out the work. The cables were found beneath the water pipeline.

  2. Measured newly rehab cable between Sonarpur-Awantipur. Found no length in F-1 & F-2. Got length of 9.0 Km from Sonarpur on F-17.

  3. Assisted Electrical SDE for measurements and survey of Transmission room for installation of split AC.

1. Two dockets ( 2850696, 2850695 ) was created by transnet For Rajpur Sarkarpara BTS. Fault were due to power issue, as no battery at the site due to multiple theft cases. Already one mail was sent to BTS mtce. Jadavpur on 20/12/2025 for which reply still awaited. Today also reminded for the same. Dockets were closed with proper remarks.

  2. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-SONARPUR 24F (route lengths and route losses).

  3. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-SITAKUNDU C2 24F (route lengths and route losses)

  4. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-SITAKUNDU C1 24F (route lengths and route losses)

  5. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-GHASIARA BTS 24F (route lengths and route losses)

  6. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-SONARPUR BAZAR BTS 24F (route lengths and route losses)

  7. OFC reading taken for AP NAGAR-ONGC 24F (route lengths and route losses)

1. Measured optical fiber length and corresponding optical loss at Harinavi End of optical fiber Harinavi-sonarpur 48F. Also updated the data on online transmission app.

  2. Measured optical fiber length of Hnv- Kmg 48F at Harinavi End and observed it is damaged at a distance of 650 m from harinavi by WBSEDCL .

1. Measured optical fiber length and corresponding optical loss at Harinavi End of two optical fiber Harinavi-subhasgram 48 F and Harinavi-subhasgram 24 F . Also updated the data on online transmission app.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets have been assigned till now.

  2. Prepared kml file for surveyed route of Kamalgazi-Harinavi-Gobindapur-Baruipur-Sasan via EM Bypass.

1. OFC cut has been detected between A.P.Nagar and Ghashiara BTS 24F cable due to rat bite near exchange side UG chamber.The fault has been atteanted by JE and JTO/TM/Harinavi. The Ofc is restored around 3:15pm

  2. New OFC route servey has been done along E.M Bypass from Harinavi to Baruipur Sashan Road by SDE/TM/Harinavi.

  3. JE and JTO/TM/Harinavi with supervisor of M/S Raja construction proactively attented the spot near Chowhati more to prevent HNV-Boral OFC Damage during water pipeline work of Rajpur Sonarpur Municipality.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets have been assigned till now.

  2. Modified and sent e-file for DPR cables earthing.

1. Created planned route for Sonarpur Ghasiara BTS to JC near Sonarpur Bidyapith on Transnet and uploaded its corresponding kml.

  2. Created planned route for Baruipur Rail crossing to JC near Padmapukur on Transnet and uploaded its corresponding kml.

  3. Created planned route for Mission Telephone Exchange to JC near Narendrapur Krishna on transnet and uploaded its corresponding kml.

  4. Uploaded photos and videos at 7 places(4 photos and 1 video at each place) for 1650m route of Sonarpur Ghasiara BTS to JC near Sonarpur Bidyapith on Transnet.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets have been assigned till now.

  2. Prepared e-file data required for e-file movement of DPR cables earthing.

  3. Measured optical fiber length and corresponding optical loss at Harinavi End of optical fiber HNV-RAJPUR SBI 48F.The Ofc is joined to Hnv-Mission 24F and Hnv-Kmg 48F near Rajpur-Kalitala More (These 2 Ofc's are damaged by WBSEDCL ). Also updated the data on online transmission app.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas Systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets were assigned up to 11:00 AM.

  2. A fault for LC ID: 1000569673 (Baruipur Police District) was reported. On analysis, it was found that the Bharat Fiber circuit was down due to a non-payment issue. The matter was informed to the concerned SDE.

  3. A docket was raised for LC ID: 1000122714 (State Bank of India, Baruipur Bazar Branch), and the ticket was assigned in prabal plus to DE/TM/South-II. The site was attended by the SLA vendor along with one TM staff (Shri Tridib Das). It was observed that the fault was due to an OFC cut. A docket was created on Transnet, tracking was done, and after restoration, the docket was closed on Transnet.

  4. Added Lokesh kalsar (+918927726344) as FRT member (ITI/BBNL) under DE/TM/South2 on Transnet.

1. Checked CPAN EMS, Tejas systems, CMTS CTD website, Prabal Plus, and Transnet for any faults. No transmission faults were found, and no tickets have been assigned till now.

  2. PP Ticket ID : PCKO251200088 assigned for high packet drop in ONGC Sonarpur(LC ID: 1000184559 ) . Site attended and found Tejas Switch is malfunctioning. Requested CPAN NOC to shift and configure 1000184559_ONGC-SONARPUR_4050 from AP NAGAR B1(138.198), port-3.5 to port-4.4 (FE mode). Shifted ONGC Lead-in 24F OFC(F-5 & F-6) from switch to CPAN port.

  3. Shifted patchcords/pigtails i to make space for FDMS for Rehab cable(Sonarpur-Awantipur). In this process DL between Sonarpur(138.227/1.5) - FIEM(138.228/2.5) and Sonarpur(138.199/4.1) - Kamalgazi(29.196/5.1) failed for few minutes.

1. Noticed ticked assigned in prabal plus for LC ID-1000560320, PNB KHEYADAH. Enquired through BBNL team and found GP up. So, fault is in between GP and Bank premises. Tried several times to book a cab but everyone cancelled and not ready to go to that remote site. At last attended site through SLA Vendor's vehicle. Found Rat bite issue there on patch chord. Ckt. restored after replacement of the Patch cord. Customer is requested to look into the matter as we are facing frequent rat bite issue in the premises to our pigtail/patch chord.

  2. E-File received from regarding Administrative Approval for preparation of PE/WBS for OFC laying through O/H & Lead/In for 1no. of site for Sr DCM, Sealdah Division, Eastern Railway at Station Manager, Sonarpur Railway Station, having File No: File No.:KOLTD-21/12(14)/12/2021-TI SOUTH TX KOL Comp. No.:42788 42788. Reply submitted and returned back the file.

  3. Some data updation work for CPAN A1s done in ctdtrans portal.

  4. Report regarding AC to DC converter for this unit is sent to DE/TM/South-II.
